DOC.brief_summary: Pharmacokinetics analysis and development of pharmacokinetics model in pregnancy women and fetus
DOC.brief_title: Development of Pharmacokinetics Model in Pregnancy Women and Fetus
DOC.criteria: 20 <= age < 50 pregnant women who were administered intramuscular dexamethasone (ex) preterm labor) pregnant women who were administered PO clarithromycin (ex) PPROM/intrauterine infection or inflammation) who deny the study entrance who administered study drug before transfer to tertiary hospital
